name: NYDailyNews
text:
Citing customers’ wish for “new payment options in light of COVID-19,” American Gaming Association group is pushing for regulators to make it easier for casinos to enable payment choices that include “safe and secure digital payment options.”
https://t.co/KcdR5QgKWZ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: A northern Wisconsin man shocked neighbors by wearing what appears to be a Ku Klux Klan robe to walk a dog.
https://t.co/9ydWMjWkGf

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Governors must help millions of low-income people who risk missing out on stimulus payments because they don’t have to file taxes, a group says.

People who earn <$12,400 (or $24,800 for couples) are not required to file federal income tax returns.
https://t.co/hNkXksLP04

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: The Ford Bronco is making its comeback — on O.J. Simpson’s 73rd birthday.

The Bronco was a pioneering SUV between 1966 and 1996, when it was discontinued, until now. 

It will ride again on July 9.
https://t.co/q2bF9J7NyX

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Traffic will be banned from a Brooklyn block that’s now home to a sprawling “Black Lives Matter” mural through the end of summer.

https://t.co/N1NlMif4ss

name: NYDailyNews
text:
An NYC pol wants the city to eliminate wasteful spending during the budget crisis, which would free up nearly $1 billion for vital services.

“The budget is filled with deals done decades ago by people we don't even remember and we don't even know why.”

https://t.co/UlG1wvPh67

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The former Atlanta cop who shot and killed Rashard Brooks had previously been reprimanded for use of force involving a firearm. 

https://t.co/4h9xuwhdfi

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: Avid online gaming fans had meltdowns after they were shut out of one of the most anticipated events of the year.
https://t.co/dbVC0qoZfd

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Unhappiness reached a historic high in U.S. thanks to the coronavirus lockdowns and soaring unemployment, a new poll shows. 

https://t.co/GKTq6nooEI
